issue.title: world frame not accessible on field in local setup

content.raw: Thanks for pointing to that post. The issue is same, however that post does not provide details of the solution. It is resolved in his case by using VPN. We are using 2 computers in the same network with Static IPs. Are there any specific ports that we should open to get the controllers communicate with the field?
content.html: Thanks for pointing to that post. The issue is same, however that post does not provide details of the solution. It is resolved in his case by using VPN. We are using 2 computers in the same network with Static IPs. Are there any specific ports that we should open to get the controllers communicate with the field?
